turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I placed an order last week, order number 12345, and it still says 'processing'. I need to know what's going on! This is ridiculous.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I understand your frustration. Let me check on order 12345 for you. One moment, please... Okay, it appears your order is being held up due to a slight inventory issue with one of the items. We're expecting a shipment tomorrow and your order should ship out within 24-48 hours after that. I apologize for the delay.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Inventory issue? Why wasn't I notified about this? And what happens if you *don't* get the shipment tomorrow? What's the backup plan? This was supposed to be a gift.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I sincerely apologize for the lack of proactive communication regarding the inventory delay. You are right, we should have informed you sooner. If the shipment is further delayed, we can offer a substitute item of equal or greater value, or issue a full refund. Which would you prefer? To prevent this happening in the future, could you provide your email so I can add you to our proactive notification list?
